Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On Rt. 746 East in the County of Bedford, in the vicinity of Robertson Rd; Rt. 691E/W (Bedford County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 141.6 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
